about_app.title: The Best Drinking Game App
about_app.meta_description: Discover why Tragos Locos is the most popular drinking game app. With over 1000 questions and challenges, themed modes and intuitive design. Download it for free!
about_app.meta_keywords: tragos locos, drinking games, party game, party app, games with alcohol, daring questions, party challenges, group games, meeting app
about_app.og_title: Tragos Locos: The Best Party Games App
about_app.og_description: The #1 drinking game app with 1000+ questions and challenges. Perfect to spice up any gathering or party. Download it for free!
about_app.twitter_description: Liven up your parties with the best drinking game app. 1000+ questions, several game modes and totally free.
about_app.hero_subtitle: Designed to create unforgettable moments and boost the fun in any kind of party or social gathering.
about_app.description_p1: Tragos Locos is the best drinking game app to liven up any party. The app includes over 1000 fun questions, unique challenges and multiple game modes that are constantly updated so you'll never run out of ideas.
about_app.description_p2: Its intuitive design makes it easy for everyone to start playing in seconds and enjoy an unforgettable experience without complications. Ideal for gatherings with friends, college parties or any social celebration.
about_app.feature_variety_desc: 1000+ questions and challenges for all tastes
about_app.feature_social_desc: Perfect to break the ice at any gathering
about_app.advantage_variety_desc: Questions and challenges for all tastes and social gatherings.
about_app.advantage_interface_desc: Designed to be intuitive and easy to use, without technical complications.
about_app.advantage_groups_desc: Ideal for small gatherings or large parties with a special teams mode.
about_app.advantage_free_desc: Free content with no mandatory sign-ups. Enjoy with no restrictions.
about_app.advantage_modes_desc: Several themed game modes to suit different occasions and preferences.
about_app.advantage_updates_desc: New content regularly to keep the experience fresh and fun.
about_app.faq_q1: Is the Tragos Locos app free?
about_app.faq_a1: Yes, Tragos Locos is completely free. You can download the app and access all game modes at no cost. No required registration or payments to enjoy the full experience.
about_app.faq_q2: What platforms is Tragos Locos available for?
about_app.faq_a2: Tragos Locos is available for Android devices through Google Play, for iOS on the App Store, and also as a web app you can open directly from your browser without installing anything.
about_app.faq_q3: How many game modes does Tragos Locos offer?
about_app.faq_a3: Tragos Locos has more than 10 different game modes, including PreParty, Tragos Locos (main mode), Best Friends, Hot, Teams, Christmas, Drink If and more. Each mode has specific questions and challenges tailored to different gatherings and preferences.
about_app.faq_q4: Is it suitable for all kinds of gatherings?
about_app.faq_a4: Yes, Tragos Locos adapts to all kinds of gatherings thanks to its different modes. There are more casual options like PreParty to break the ice, and daring options like the Hot mode for close friends. There are also themed modes like Christmas or specific ones like Teams for large groups.
about_app.cta_subtitle: Download the app now and discover the easiest way to boost the fun at your celebrations.
about_app.available_platforms: Available for iOS, Android and Web
about_app.discover_subtitle: The ideal app for your parties and social gatherings

preparty.title: PreParty
preparty.description: Best for animate the party. Light fun for any group.
preparty.seo_html:
üçπ PreParty Warm-Up

Kick off the night with quick icebreakers and lighthearted challenges. Perfect to get everyone laughing before the real party starts.

üéâ Works great on mobile. Ideal for any gathering.

crazy.title: Tragos Locos
crazy.description: Take your party to the next level. The most daring questions. Only for the brave.
crazy.seo_html:
ü§™ Crazy Mode

Wild dares and outrageous questions turn any night into a hilarious memory. Only for the brave who love surprises.

üöÄ Best for parties looking to push limits.

best-friends.title: Best Friends
best-friends.description: Best for playing with close friends. Let's get to know each other better.
best-friends.seo_html:
üëØ Best Friends

Discover secrets and memories with those closest to you. Personal questions spark laughter and strengthen bonds.

üí¨ Great for small groups that know each other well.

hot.title: Hot
hot.description: Oriented towards the most perverse questions, get ready to reveal your most intimate secrets.
hot.seo_html:
üî• Hot Mode

Spicy dares and intimate questions turn up the heat. Perfect for couples or daring groups ready to reveal secrets.

üíñ Play responsibly and keep the mood fun.

progressive.title: Progressive
progressive.description: Start with lighter challenges and gradually raise the intensity for an escalating party.
progressive.seo_html:
üìà Progressive Mode

Start with easy challenges and gradually raise the intensity. Perfect for building suspense and energy throughout the night.

‚è≥ Ideal when you want a smooth escalation.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Too many payers? Let's make teams and play! The best way to play with a lot of people.
teams.seo_html:
üèÜ Team Battles

Split into groups and compete in hilarious challenges. Collaboration and rivalry make huge parties unforgettable.

ü§ù Perfect for large gatherings.

christmas.title: Christmas
christmas.description: The christmas is here! Let's have fun with chsitmas themed questions.
christmas.seo_html:
üéÑ Christmas Edition

Seasonal questions and festive dares to celebrate with holiday cheer. Bring the spirit of Christmas to your party.

üéÖ Only available in December.

drinkIf.title: Drink If
drinkIf.description: Read the card and drink if it applies to you. Perfect to break the ice.
drinkIf.seo_html:
ü•Ç Drink If...

Read a card and drink if it applies to you. Simple rules that guarantee laughs and quick bonding.

üçª Great as an icebreaker.

resurrectionFest.title: Resurrection Fest
resurrectionFest.description: Metal and festival themed challenges to celebrate the Resurrection Fest.
resurrectionFest.seo_html:
ü§ò Resurrection Fest

Metal vibes and festival-themed challenges for fans of the legendary event. Rock out and drink with fellow metalheads.

üé∏ Available during festival dates.

sanJuan.title: San Juan
sanJuan.description: Challenges and questions to celebrate St John's Eve.
sanJuan.seo_html:
üî• St John's Eve Drinking Game

Celebrate St John's Eve like never before with wild dares, bold questions and lots of fire. Bring the best beach party game to your bonfire and create magical memories.

üåô Mobile friendly. Perfect for San Juan 2025 celebrations.

duel.title: Duel
duel.seo_html:
‚öîÔ∏è Duel Mode

Face off one-on-one in quick challenges. Winner boasts, loser drinks. Intense showdowns keep everyone on edge.

üèÖ Try it when you want direct competition.

cascade.title: Cascade Drinking
cascade.description: One action triggers another. Keep the chain going!
cascade.seo_html:
üíß Cascade Drinking

Each action triggers the next in a chain reaction. Keep the flow going and see who breaks first.

üåä Fun for groups that love momentum.
